channel.title: Client Crashes. Can anyone help?
channel.description:
Right. Basically, what happens is, i can open up the client, log in, and sit there, but when i try and move, trade, bank, literally anything apart from equip weapons, the client crashes. The error below is created and it is in a text file named "hs_err_pid7688.txt". I have no idea how to fix this, i have re installed java jre and jdk multiple times. I have even re installed windows. Other people are able to play on the server using the same client as me. I am running Windows Vista Home Premium 64 bit.
Any help is greatly appreciated. Thanks.
[code] # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8e18c6, pid=7688, tid=10776 # # JRE version: 6.0_14-b08 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.0-b16 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x518c6] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #

item.title: Client Crashes. Can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @memorial memorial
item.description:
@memorial wrote:

To fix your problem you should go.

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp download jre 6 update 15 and when it asks you for the platform do windowsx64 because your client is not reconizing the right java as your right operating system. do the same thing with jdk and it should work.

happy to help!

Read full topic

item.title: Client Crashes. Can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @_Owns !~Owns~!
item.description:
@_Owns wrote:

http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp

Submit a bug report

Read full topic

item.title: Client Crashes. Can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @novalty novalty
item.description:
@novalty wrote:

Right. Basically, what happens is, i can open up the client, log in, and sit there, but when i try and move, trade, bank, literally anything apart from equip weapons, the client crashes. The error below is created and it is in a text file named “hs_err_pid7688.txt”. I have no idea how to fix this, i have re installed java jre and jdk multiple times. I have even re installed windows. Other people are able to play on the server using the same client as me. I am running Windows Vista Home Premium 64 bit.

Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks.
